"The monk's envoy will come up and sit down.
"A peregrine is on top of the peregrine.
They dare to put up their nest.
'A dragon doesn't form on a stick.'
He then played a sitting cloth.
After he finished making tea, he said.
"He's just come to be disobedient to the monk.
"Nan Jiang Du is a Chan guest.
What is the second bowl he's seeking?

source_sentence: 襄州鹿門慧昭山主楊億侍郎問曰。
translation: Squire Yang Yi, the monastery manager of Lumen Huizhao in Xiangzhou, asked him.
"He's not afraid of tigers when he enters the mountains.
What happens when he's on the road but is on guard against people?
"The big head of rock has a big base.
The bottom of the small one is small.
"How is this person on the mountain?
The prime minister, Wang Fei, followed the monk to Shoushan.
He got the intention beyond what was said.
He then put it into practice himself.
He deeply understood the great teaching.
On his deathbed, he wrote a verse, saying.
"The lamp in the drawing room has gone out.
Who will point the finger and tell it to others?
'The past and future lives of the buddhas are originally ordinary.'
The spring breeze sweeps away the remaining snow.
